tgt_original: 過去未來現在智不可思議故，菩薩修行甚深般若波羅蜜多亦不可思議； 無著智不可思議故，菩薩修行甚深般若波羅蜜多亦不可思議； 涅槃不可思議故，菩薩修行甚深般若波羅蜜多亦不可思議；

src_original: buddhadharmācintyatayā acintyeyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
tgt_original: 佛、法、僧寶不可思議故，菩薩修行甚深般若波羅蜜多亦不可思議。 何以故？

src_original: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā,  tenocyate acintyeti //
tgt_original: 善勇猛！ 菩薩修行甚深般若波羅蜜多，非心所生故名不可思議，亦不生心故名不可思議。

src_original: cittasyotpāda iti suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāsa eṣaḥ /  cittaṃ cittajamiti suvikrāntavikrāmiṃścetasaḥ pratiṣedha eṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 「復次，善勇猛！ 若謂心生是為顛倒，謂心不生亦是顛倒，若能通達心及心所俱無所有則非顛倒。 善勇猛！

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vaidyaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tantraupayikayā  mīmāṃsayā samanvāgataḥ syāt sarvabhaiṣajyakuśalaḥ sarvavyādhyutpattikuśalaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocanakaḥ /  sa yaṃ yameva glānaṃ cikitsati taṃ tameva mocayat /
tgt_original: 譬如良醫聰明博達，隨有所作皆善觀察，成就觀察微妙慧故，善識諸藥、善達病因，善知病相能救眾苦，隨所療疾無不除愈。

src_original: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā /

src_original: tatra cittamapi vivṛtam,  yena viparyāsenotpadyate tadati vivṛtam /

src_original: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti /  yatrāpyutpadyeta tadapi vivṛtam,  yenāpyutpadyeta tadapi vivṛtamiti /

tgt_original: 由不覺了可開示故，於心遠離不能正知，亦不正知所緣遠離，由斯執著心即是我、心是我所、心依於我、心從我生。

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?

src_original: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin tṛtīyā vidyā sarvāvidyopaśamāya saṃvartate,  sarvaduḥkhaniryātanāya saṃvartate,
tgt_original: 如是若有成第三明，能滅諸無明，能息一切苦，能除一切生老病死及諸愁歎苦憂惱法，是名出世通達般若。 「復次，善勇猛！

src_original: ārambaṇe sati suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanāścittamutpādayanti /

src_original: tatra bodhisattvo 'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate?
tgt_original: 諸菩薩眾知彼所緣及彼所起心、心所法都無所有，是故不生心、心所法。

src_original: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate - prakṛtiprabhāsvaramidaṃ cittam /
tgt_original: 「菩薩如是觀察一切心、心所法本性清淨、本性明白，愚夫顛倒妄生雜染，復作是念：

src_original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ārambaṇaṃ pratītya cittamutpadyate iti /  sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati /
tgt_original: 『由所緣境心、心所生，了知所緣無所有故，心、心所法皆不得生，既不得生亦無住、滅。

src_original: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham /
tgt_original: 心、心所法本性明淨，離諸雜染清白可樂。

src_original: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati /
tgt_original: 心性不生亦無住、滅，亦不令法有生、住等，但諸愚夫妄執斯事。

src_original: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin cittānutpādaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
tgt_original: 』如是菩薩知心、心所本性不生亦不住、滅，修行般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: ya evaṃ carati bodhisattvaḥ,  sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /

src_original: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
tgt_original: 如是行時，不作是念：

src_original: asyāṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,  anena carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,  asmāccarāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti /
tgt_original: 『我行般若波羅蜜多，我今依此而行般若波羅蜜多，我今由此而行般若波羅蜜多，我今從此而行般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: anena prajñāpāramitā,  asya vā prajñāpāramiteti,
tgt_original: 『此是般若波羅蜜多，此由般若波羅蜜多，此依般若波羅蜜多，此屬般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,  carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
tgt_original: 』彼由此念，非行般若波羅蜜多。 若諸菩薩於諸般若波羅蜜多，無見無得而行般若波羅蜜多，是行般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bahujanahitāya pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,  etarhyanāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāma iti //
tgt_original: 汝為菩薩摩訶薩眾得義利故，欲令眾生得利益故，亦為眾生得安樂故，哀愍世間大眾生故，利益安樂諸天、人故，欲為現在未來菩薩摩訶薩等作照明故，請問如來、應、正等覺甚深般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /  niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /  atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /  anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā  punaḥ kaiścinnimittacaritairupalambhacaritairātmadṛṣṭibhiḥ sattvadṛṣṭibhirjīvadṛṣṭibhiḥ
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是無上行，菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是清淨行，菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是明白行，菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是無生行，菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是無滅行，菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是超出行，菩薩如是行深般若波羅蜜多是難伏行，謂諸惡魔若魔眷屬，若餘有相，有所得行，若我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者，所有諸見、若斷常見、若諸蘊見、若諸處見、若諸界見、若諸佛見、若諸法見、若諸僧見、若涅槃見、若證得想；

src_original: iyamucyate suvikrāntavikrāmin lokottarā prajñā nirvedhagāminīti //  idaṃ ca me suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃghāya bhāṣitam -  prajñā śreṣṭhā hi lokasya yeyaṃ nirvedhagāminī /  yayā samyak prajānāti bhavajātiparikṣayam //  iti /
tgt_original: 我依此義密意說言： 一切世間慧為最勝，謂能通達諸法實性，由此正知令有生盡。

src_original: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat /
tgt_original: 」爾時，世尊告善勇猛： 「如是！ 如汝所說。 如是菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，超諸世間、無能及者、最尊最勝。

src_original: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,  antaśo nirvāṇadṛṣṭikairapi nirvāṇābhiniviṣṭairvā anākramaṇīyā sarvabālapṛthagjanairvā /
tgt_original: 一切惡魔若魔天子、眷屬、軍眾皆不能伏，乃至執著涅槃相性所有諸見亦不能伏，一切愚夫異生等行，於此菩薩所行之行皆不能伏。 善勇猛！

src_original: yā bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃścaryā,  neyaṃ caryā bālapṛthagjanānām /

src_original: nāpīyaṃ caryā śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakayānīyānām,  nāpi pratyekabuddhayānīyānām /

src_original: te 'pi tathāgatā vā caturvaiśāradyaprāptā abhaviṣyan /  yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,  tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,  vaiśāradyabhūmiriyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin dharme,
tgt_original: 聲聞、獨覺若有此行，應不說名聲聞、獨覺，應名菩薩，當得如來四無畏等無邊功德。

src_original: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,

src_original: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena /
tgt_original: 善勇猛！ 若諸菩薩未證無上正等菩提，由大願力或諸如來護持之力，行深般若波羅蜜多，速能攝受四無畏等無邊功德。 善勇猛！

src_original: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,  nāpi tathāgatasteṣāṃ caturvaiśāradyamadhitiṣṭhati /
tgt_original: 聲聞、獨覺不能願求四無畏等諸佛功德，諸佛世尊亦不護念令彼證得四無畏等。

src_original: bodhisattvabhūmireṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin yasyāṃ caturvaiśāradyamanuprāpyate praṇidhānavaśena /
tgt_original: 「善勇猛！ 諸菩薩眾由大願力及諸如來護持之力，當能證得四無畏等，何以故？

src_original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃścaranto bodhisattvāḥ catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāpnuvanti /

src_original: katamāścatasraḥ?

src_original: yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidaṃ niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvidam /
tgt_original: 義無礙解、法無礙解、詞無礙解、辯無礙解，如是名為四無礙解。

src_original: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti /  tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam //  punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,  yatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ na yojayati /
tgt_original: 諸菩薩眾成就如是四無礙解，雖未證得所求無上正等菩提，由大願力，即能攝受四無畏等諸佛功德。 諸佛世尊知彼成就四無礙解勝善根故，知彼已得甚深般若波羅蜜多功德地故，以神通力勤加護念，令彼攝受四無畏等諸佛功德，是故菩薩欲求證得四無礙解，欲求攝受四無畏等功德善根，應學般若波羅蜜多，應行般若波羅蜜多，勿生執著。

src_original: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānāti /  teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
tgt_original: 「復次，善勇猛！ 若諸菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，通達諸法若因、若集、若沒、若滅，無有少法不合般若波羅蜜多，是諸菩薩如實了知諸法因、集、滅、道之相，知法因、集、滅、道相已，於色不修不遣，於受、想、行、識亦不修不遣，於眼不修不遣，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意亦不修不遣，於色不修不遣，於聲、香、味、觸、法亦不修不遣，於眼識不修不遣，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識亦不修不遣，於名、色不修不遣，於染、淨不修不遣，於緣起不修不遣，於顛倒、見趣、諸蓋、愛行不修不遣，於貪、瞋、癡不修不遣，於欲、色、無色界不修不遣，於地、水、火、風、空、識界不修不遣，於有情界、法界不修不遣，於我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者不修不遣，於斷、常見不修不遣，於布施、慳貪、持戒、犯戒、安忍、忿恚、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂、般若、惡慧不修不遣，於念住、正斷、神足、根、力、覺支、道支不修不遣，於靜慮、解脫、等持、等至不修不遣，於斷顛倒不修不遣，於苦、集、滅、道不修不遣，於無量、神通不修不遣，於盡智、無生智、無造作智不修不遣，於異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地不修不遣，於異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛法不修不遣，於止、觀不修不遣，於涅槃不修不遣，於過去未來現在智見不修不遣，於無著智不修不遣，於佛智不修不遣，於無畏等諸佛功德不修不遣。

src_original: na dānamātsaryaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /  na śīladauḥśīlyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /  na kṣāntivyāpādaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /  va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /

tgt_original: 時，諸惡魔共集一處，思惟方便欲壞菩薩，互相謂言：

src_original: kiṃ nu kariṣyāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 『我等今者當設何計、作何事業壞此菩薩所修正行？

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti /  te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
tgt_original: 』時，惡魔眾心懷疑惑，愁憂不樂如中毒箭，共相勸勵往菩薩所，伺求其短現怖畏事。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvasya romāpi na hṛṣyati,  na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā /  vigatabhayaromaharṣaśca māraḥ pāpīyāniti saṃbudhyate /  buddhvā cādhiṣṭhānaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 由此菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多威神力故，諸惡魔眾盡其神力，尚不能動菩薩毛端，況令菩薩身心變異。 時，諸惡魔覺知菩薩遠離驚恐、毛竪等事，更設方便種種魅惑，心神俱劣懷怖畏故，諸魅惑事皆不能成。

src_original: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ /
tgt_original: 時，惡魔王便作是念：

src_original: na cāsya śaknotyavatāraṃ labdhum /  tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamevāsya na śakto 'vatāraṃ labdhum,  kiṃ punarmama parṣat,  kiṃ punaryadanye 'dhiṣṭhāsyanti /
tgt_original: 『我尚不能壞此菩薩，況我眷屬或餘能壞！

src_original: tataste mārā(strastā utsāhapa)  rihīṇāḥ svabhavanāni gatvā duḥkhadaurmanasyajātāḥ pradhyāyantastiṣṭhanti,
tgt_original: 』念已驚怖力盡計窮，還歸自宮愁憂而住。

src_original: iyaṃ(daṃ) suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato (bodhisattvasya)  evaṃrūpaṃ prajñābalādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati,  evaṃrūpeṇa ca prajñābalādhiṣṭhānena samanvāgato bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩修行般若波羅蜜多，成就如是功德智慧大威神力。

src_original: sacedye sarvasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ,  te sarve mārā bhaveyuḥ,  te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ /  te 'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum /
tgt_original: 假使三千大千世界諸有情類皆變為魔，一一皆將爾所魔眾，為擾亂故往菩薩所，盡其神力亦不能障所修般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati /  acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati /
tgt_original: 善勇猛！ 爾時，菩薩成就如是甚深般若刀劍力故，亦復成就不可思議、不可測量及無等等般若力故，不為一切暴惡魔軍之所降伏。

src_original: mahāśastraṃ hyetatsuvikrāntavikrāmin yaduta prajñāśastram,  mahākhaḍgo hyeṣa suvikrāntavikrāmin yaduta prajñākhaḍgaḥ,
tgt_original: 夫大刀者，謂般若刀； 夫大劍者，謂般若劍； 夫大力者，謂般若力。

src_original: yatrāgatiraviṣayo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām,  abhūmirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
tgt_original: 是故般若波羅蜜多非諸惡魔所行境地。

src_original: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu (Vaidya 60)  sadevanikāyeṣu,
tgt_original: 諸有外仙得四靜慮、四無色定，超欲魔境生諸梵天、四無色地。

src_original: teṣāmapi tāvadagatiraviṣayaḥ yaduta evaṃrūpāyāṃ prajñāyām,  yā bodhisattvasya prajñā prākṛtā,  kiṃ punaryā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñā,
tgt_original: 彼於菩薩常所成就世間妙慧尚非行境，況實般若波羅蜜多！

src_original: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau /
tgt_original: 何況惡魔能行此境！ 彼於獲得色、無色定外仙妙慧尚非行境，況於般若波羅蜜多！ 善勇猛！

src_original: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena /
tgt_original: 若時菩薩成就般若波羅蜜多，爾時菩薩名為成就大威力者；

src_original: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
tgt_original: 若有成就般若威力，即名成就利慧刀者； 若有成就般若利刀，即名成就利慧劍者。

src_original: adhṛṣyāste bhavanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiranākramaṇīyāḥ /
tgt_original: 諸惡魔軍不能降伏，而能降伏一切魔軍。

src_original: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,  na te kvacinniśrayaṃ kurvanti,  aniśritāste bhavanti /
tgt_original: 「復次，善勇猛！ 若諸菩薩成就般若波羅蜜多利慧刀劍具大勢力，是諸菩薩於一切處無所依止，諸有所作亦無所依。

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,  calite sati spandanā bhavati,  spandanāyāṃ satyāṃ prapañcanā bhavati /  bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā bhavanti,
tgt_original: 善勇猛！ 若有所依則有移轉，若有移轉則有動搖，若有動搖則有戲論。

src_original: aparimuktāśca bhavanti te māraviṣayāt /
tgt_original: 善勇猛！ 若諸有情有依、有轉動搖戲論，是諸有情隨魔力行未脫魔境。 善勇猛！

src_original: ye 'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,  te 'pyāgamiṣyanti punarmāraviṣayam /  aparimuktāśca te mārapāśebhyaḥ,  anugatasūtrāśca te mārapāśaiḥ /
tgt_original: 若諸有情雖復乃至上生有頂有所依止，繫屬所依依所、依處，彼必還墮魔境界中，未脫惡魔所有羂網，惡魔索縷常所隨逐。

src_original: tadyathā udrakaśca rāmaputraḥ ārāḍaśca kālāmaḥ,  ye vā punaranye 'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ /
tgt_original: 如猛憙子及阿邏茶迦邏摩子，并餘一切依止無色，繫屬所依依所、依處諸仙外道。 善勇猛！

src_original: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多，修深般若波羅蜜多，會深般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: aniśrito bhavati sarvatra /
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩於一切處無所依止，諸有所作亦無所依。

src_original: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,  tasmin samaye na rūpaniśrito bhavati,  na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaniśrito bhavati,
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩勇猛精進修行般若波羅蜜多隨順安住，爾時菩薩不依止色，亦不依止受、想、行、識；

src_original: na viparyāsanīvaraṇadṛṣṭigataniśrito bhavati,
tgt_original: 不依止眼，亦不依止耳、鼻、舌、身、意；

src_original: na nāmarūpaniśrito bhavati,  na kāmarūpārūpyadhātuniśrito bhavati,
tgt_original: 不依止色，亦不依止聲、香、味、觸、法；

src_original: na pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānenaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatananiśrito bhavati,  na tṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati,  na bhavatṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati,  nocchedatṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati,  nāntānantaniśrito bhavati,  na pratītyasamutpādaniśrito bhavati,  na dānamātsaryaniśrito bhavati,
tgt_original: 不依止眼識，亦不依止耳、鼻、舌、身、意識；

src_original: tena niruddhā eva sarvadharmā jñātā dṛṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /  tenocyate nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti ////
tgt_original: 於一切法如是知見、通達、作證，說名盡智。

src_original: na śīlaśauḥśīlyaniśrito bhavati,  na kṣāntivyāpādaniśrito bhavati,  na vīryakausīdyaniśrito bhavati,  na dhyānavikṣepaniśrito bhavati,  na prajñādauṣprajñyaniśrito bhavati,  nāviparyāsasamyakprahāṇāpramāṇasmṛtyupasthānaniśrito bhavati,
tgt_original: 不依止名、色，不依止顛倒、見趣、諸蓋及諸愛行，不依止緣起，不依止欲、色、無色界，不依止我、有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者及彼諸想，不依止地、水、火、風、空、識界，不依止有情界、法界，不依止初靜慮乃至非想非非想處，不依止有愛，不依止無有愛，不依止斷、常，不依止有性，不依止無性，不依止布施、慳貪、持戒、犯戒、安忍、忿恚、精進、懈怠、靜慮、散亂、般若、惡慧，不依止念住、正斷、神足、根、力、覺支、道支，不依止斷顛倒等，不依止靜慮、解脫、等持、等至，不依止苦、集、滅、道，不依止盡智、無生智、無造作智，不依止無著智見，不依止明及解脫，不依止解脫智見，不依止異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛地，不依止異生、聲聞、獨覺、菩薩、佛法，不依止涅槃，不依止過去未來現在智見，不依止三世平等性，不依止佛智、力、無畏等，不依止一切智智，不依止相好圓滿，不依止佛土圓滿，不依止聲聞眾圓滿，不依止菩薩眾圓滿，不依止一切法，不依止移轉，不依止動搖，不依止戲論。

src_original: nendriyabalabodhyaṅgasamādhisamāpattiniśrito bhavati,  na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārganiśrito bhavati,  nānutpādajñānakṣayajñānānabhisaṃskārajñānaniśrito bhavati,  na vidyāvimuktiniśrito bhavati,  na vimuktijñānadarśananiśrito bhavati,  na pṛthagjanaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhadharmaniśrito bhavati,
tgt_original: 由無依止除遣一切，亦不執著無依止道，於無依止亦不恃執，亦復不得此是依止，亦復不得在此依止，亦復不得屬此依止，亦復不得依此依止，於所依止亦無恃執。

src_original: kṣayajñānamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kṣīṇamajñānam /  tenocyate kṣayajñānamiti /
tgt_original: 「善勇猛！ 盡智者，謂盡無知故名盡智。

src_original: na sarvajñajñānaniśrito (Vaidya 61)  bhavati, na lakṣaṇasaṃpattiniśrito bhavati,  na buddhakṣetrasaṃpanniśrito bhavati,  na śrāvakavyūhasaṃpanniśrito bhavati,  na bodhisattvavyūhasaṃpanniśrito bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩於諸依止，無恃無得，無執無取，無說無欣，無著而住，不為一切依止所染，於諸依止亦無滯礙，證得一切依止淨法。

src_original: prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ grāhikā yaduta śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvasamyaksaṃbuddhadharmāṇām /
tgt_original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多通攝聲聞、獨覺、菩薩及正等覺一切法故。

src_original: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,  yenāsya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labhante,  anākramaṇīyaśca bhavati sarvamāraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ,
tgt_original: 此諸菩薩依一切法，依止清淨微妙智見，修行般若波羅蜜多，由此惡魔不能得便，惡魔軍眾不能降伏，而能降伏一切魔軍。

src_original: kena kṣīṇam?
tgt_original: 由何名盡？

src_original: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,  bahubuddhaparyupāsitaśca bhavati,  bahubuddhaparipṛcchakaśca bhavati,  kṛtādhikāraśca bhavati buddhānāṃ bhagavatām,  adhyāśayasaṃpannaśca bhavati,  dānasaṃvibhāgarataśca bhavati,  śīlaviśuddhigurukaśca bhavati,
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩未發無上正等覺心，先應積集無量無數善根資糧，多供養佛、事多善友，於多佛所請問法要，發弘誓願意樂具足，於諸有情樂行布施，於清淨戒尊重護持，忍辱柔和悉皆具足，勇猛精進離諸懈怠，尊重修行鮮白靜慮，於清淨慧恭敬修學。

src_original: akṣayatayā kṣīṇam /  kṣayamasya na samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 謂由無盡故名為盡，不見有法可名為盡。

src_original: so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso 'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca - yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labheran,  mā ca me viheṭhāṃ kuryuḥ /
tgt_original: 『勿為惡魔伺求我短作擾亂事。 』由斯力故，令諸惡魔不能得便障所修學，亦令魔眾不起是心：

src_original: nāpi cittamutpādayanti - kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,  viheṭhanāṃ kuryāmaha iti /  sacetteṣāṃ cittamutpadyate 'ntarāyāya,
tgt_original: 『我當伺求此菩薩便，為擾亂事障礙所修。 』設起是心即令自覺：

src_original: tato mahāvyasanamātmanaḥ saṃjānate,
tgt_original: 『我作斯事必遭大苦。

src_original: bhayaṃ ca teṣāṃ mahatpratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 』由斯發起大恐怖心：

src_original: saṃvignāśca bhavanti - mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti /  te tadviheṭhanācittaṃ punarapi pratisaṃharanti /  punarapi teṣāṃ te cittotpādā antardhīyante /
tgt_original: 『勿我今時喪失身命故，應息此擾亂之心。 』於是魔軍惡心隱沒。 善勇猛！

src_original: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante //
tgt_original: 由此因緣，惡魔軍眾不能障礙菩薩所學甚深般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: ajñānavigama eṣa suvikrāntavikrāmin /  tenocyate kṣayajñānamiti /
tgt_original: 然離無知說名盡智，即盡無知說名盡智。

src_original: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ  deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati /
tgt_original: 「復次，善勇猛！ 若諸菩薩聞說般若波羅蜜多，起純淨欲增上意樂，深心尊重，稱讚功德，起大師想；

src_original: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
tgt_original: 聞說六種波羅蜜多相應法教，亦不發起猶豫疑惑；

src_original: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 聞甚深法心不迷謬，亦復不起猶豫疑惑；

src_original: nāpyanena jātu dharmavyavasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ bhavati,  nāpyanena jātu dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 終不造作感匱法業，亦不發起感匱法心；

src_original: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
tgt_original: 勸導無量無邊有情，信受修學甚深般若波羅蜜多；

tgt_original: 「眾會功德非我能讚。 所以者何？

src_original: prāgeva anyaiḥ satvaiḥ /  neyaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣattathāgatena saṃnipatitā,
tgt_original: 今此眾會成就無量無邊功德，如妙高山讚不能盡。 」於是佛告舍利子言：

src_original: svenaiva kuśalamūlena iyaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā parṣat saṃnipatitā /  nāsyāṃ parṣadi tathāgatena kaścidvyāpārito nāpyadhīṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: 如汝所說。 今此眾會成就無邊清淨、希有、殊勝功德，諸佛世尊稱揚讚歎尚不能盡，況餘有情！

src_original: svenaiva kuśalamūlenaite saṃcoditāḥ yadasyāṃ parṣadyāgatāḥ /
tgt_original: 又，舍利子！ 今此眾會非佛世尊力所令集，亦非如來於此眾會有所欲樂而令其集，但由此眾自善根力得聞我名而來集會。 又此大眾非為佛來，亦非如來神通召命，但由此眾自善根力之所覺發而來至此。

src_original: atha khalu tasyāmeva parṣadi suvikrāntavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /  sa utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya  yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
tgt_original: 時，大眾中有菩薩摩訶薩名善勇猛，從座而起頂禮佛足，偏覆左肩，右膝著地，合掌恭敬而白佛言：

src_original: ye te bhagavan sattvā bodhijñānamapi na manyante nābhiniviśante nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhanti,  sarvamanyanāsamatikrāntā mārgasthitā mārgapratipannā mārgadaiśikāḥ,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩超越一切憍慢執著，能住正道、能行正道、能說正道，我今為彼請問如來、應、正等覺甚深般若波羅蜜多；

src_original: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩恒為饒益一切有情，能為利益、能為安樂、能令安隱，我今為彼請問如來、應、正等覺甚深般若波羅蜜多。 「復次，世尊！

src_original: sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sukhamupasaṃhartukāmā anuttarasukhaṃ niruttarasukhaṃ nirvāṇasukhaṃ buddhasukhamasaṃskṛtasukham /
tgt_original: 我為普施一切有情無染安樂、無上安樂、無勝安樂、涅槃安樂、諸佛安樂、無為安樂，請問如來、應、正等覺甚深般若波羅蜜多；

src_original: tena vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayacchittyarthaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 我為永斷一切有情種種疑網、煩惱、纏結，請問如來、應、正等覺甚深般若波羅蜜多； 我為自斷種種疑網、煩惱、纏結，請問如來、應、正等覺甚深般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: niḥsaṃśayā vayaṃ bhagavan bhavitukāmāḥ,  niḥsaṃśayāśca bhagavan sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃśayaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayitukāmāḥ /
tgt_original: 若我疑網、煩惱、纏結自永斷者，乃能如實為諸有情說斷疑網、煩惱、纏結種種法要。

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: sarvasattvā hi bhagavan sukhakāmā duḥkhapratikūlāḥ,  sarvasattvāḥ sukhenārthikāḥ /  na ca vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kiṃcidanyatsukhaṃ samanupaśyāmo 'nyatra prajñātaḥ /
tgt_original: 一切有情皆欣安樂並厭危苦，一切有情皆設方便追求安樂，我都不見有餘少分安樂可求，唯除般若波羅蜜多；
